html:
Destack - Free your stack
GithubNpmReddit

Welcome to Destack

üß±¬†Powerful Blocks

There are 92 well designed and heavily functional blocks from the¬†Tailblocks¬†project.


üèû¬†Assets Uploading

Stores the images uploaded in the editor in your repo. Displays them when needed on production.


üÉè¬†Delightful Builder

Powered by¬†Grapes.js, a flexible and feature-full editor with CSS like options similar to Webflow.


üïπ¬†Data Ownership

Destack stores all your assets on Github, Bitbucket etc through the editor. There are no external dependencies to manage or worry about.


üë©üèª‚Äçüíª¬†Developer Ready

Works out of the box with any¬†Next.js¬†project. Build a few landing pages with Destack and the rest of your app with the usuall Next.js toolkit.


üèÉüèΩ¬†Instant Deployment

Destack supports environment detection. The visual editor comes up only in development and the compiled version on production.


üì∏¬†Easy Setup

Click the¬†Deploy¬†button below to create a new Destack project on Vercel or head to¬†Installing the plugin¬†for instructions for your existing Next.js projects.

Raw Denim Heirloom Man Braid

Blue bottle crucifix vinyl post-ironic four dollar toast vegan taxidermy. Gastropub indxgo juice poutine, ramps microdosing banh mi pug.

Shooting Stars

Blue bottle crucifix vinyl post-ironic four dollar toast vegan taxidermy. Gastropub indxgo juice poutine, ramps microdosing banh mi pug VHS try-hard.

Learn More

The Catalyzer

Blue bottle crucifix vinyl post-ironic four dollar toast vegan taxidermy. Gastropub indxgo juice poutine, ramps microdosing banh mi pug VHS try-hard.

Learn More

Neptune

Blue bottle crucifix vinyl post-ironic four dollar toast vegan taxidermy. Gastropub indxgo juice poutine, ramps microdosing banh mi pug VHS try-hard.

Learn More

css: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body {margin: 0;}.title-font.sm\:text-4xl.text-2xl.mb-4.font-medium.text-gray-900{font-size:56px;line-height:64px;margin:0 0 80px 0;text-align:center;}#i0xwq{background-color:initial;text-decoration:none;}#i1kwj{background-color:initial;text-decoration:none;}#i9qnq{background-color:initial;text-decoration:none;}.mb-8.leading-relaxed{position:static;display:inline-block;font-family:Brush Script MT, sans-serif;}.container.mx-auto.flex.px-5.py-24.items-center.justify-center.flex-col{border:dotted black;font-family:Brush Script MT, sans-serif;}.mr-5.hover\:text-gray-900{border:solid #000000;}
